shortdesc.ph: Stops the media stream relay across channels.
Stops media stream relay across channels.

section.p: Call this method to stop the media stream relay across channels. Once the relay stops, the host leaves all destination channels.
After calling this method, the broadcaster leaves all destination channels.
section.note: If the method call fails, the SDK triggers the callback and returns the error code RELAY_ERROR_SERVER_NO_RESPONSE (2) or RELAY_ERROR_SERVER_CONNECTION_LOST (8). You can also call the leaveChannel method to leave the channel, and the media stream relay will automatically stop.

If the method call fails, the SDK reports the error code RELAY_ERROR_SERVER_NO_RESPONSE (2) or RELAY_ERROR_SERVER_CONNECTION_LOST (8) through the callback. You can also call the leaveChannel method to leave the channel, and the media stream relay will automatically stop.

section.title: Related Callbacks
section.p: After this method is successfully called, the SDK triggers the callback to report the state of the media stream relay.

-5: The call is rejected. There is no ongoing media stream relay across channels.
